input:
Sentence1: My garden flowers are dying. Sentence2: They are wilting and dry from the sun. Sentence3: My friend came by to help evaluate what is wrong with my plants. Sentence4: She discovered they needed more water. 
 Sentence5: After watering them more, my plants look better than ever.

Sentence1: Fred decided to buy some shares of Apple. Sentence2: The stock price was 90 dollars when he bought it. Sentence3: Luckily they had great earnings yesterday. Sentence4: The stock then went up to 100 dollars. 
 Sentence5: Fred regretted his stock purchase.

Sentence1: Timmy was competing in the 3 point competition at his school. Sentence2: The winner would have a chance to win a $1000 college scholarship. Sentence3: Timmy practiced shooting 3 pointers all weekend. Sentence4: He was ready when the day of the competition arrived. 
 Sentence5: Timmy won the competition.
